channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: It’s not just Netflix. Here’s how much streaming prices have gone up in the past 5 years
item.description: Streaming isn’t nearly as cheap as it used to be.

item.title: Dozens of Reddit communities are banning links to X as many are calling Elon Musk’s controversial hand gesture on Inauguration Day a Nazi salute
item.description: Users are furious at Musk for a hand gesture on Inauguration Day.

item.title: Trump says ‘the Russia-Ukraine war would end immediately’ if Saudi Arabia and OPEC lowered the price of oil
item.description: President Donald Trump doubled down on ending the war in Ukraine during his speech at Davos a day after threatening Russia and Putin with tariffs and ...

item.title: Rebels Backed by Rwanda Close In on Major City in Congo
item.description: Many Congolese see the rebel advance as an invasion of their country by a foreign power in an attempt to seize land and Congo’s valuable rare minerals...

item.title: Israeli Forces Kill 2 Palestinian Militants Wanted for Deadly Attack
item.description: The men were affiliated with a militant group, Palestinian Islamic Jihad, which carried out an attack earlier this month, the military said.

item.title: As the H-1B visa debate tears MAGA apart, Indian-Americans are shaping America’s future
item.description: Indian-Americans are not just participants in America’s story—they are at its forefront.

item.title: Israeli Forces Kill 2 Palestinian Militants Wanted for Deadly Attack
item.description: The men were affiliated with a militant group, Palestinian Islamic Jihad, which carried out an attack earlier this month, the military said.

item.title: Ukraine Is Losing Fewer Soldiers Than Russia — but It’s Still Losing the War
item.description: Russia has lost about twice as many men to death and serious injury as Ukraine. But the trends favor the Kremlin.

item.title: New Research Finds Potential Alternative to Abortion Pill Mifepristone

item.title: 2025 Oscar Nominations: See the Full List
item.description: The movies competing for the 97th Academy Awards. The ceremony will air on March 2.

item.title: Sacklers Up Their Offer to Settle Purdue Opioids Cases, With a New Condition

item.title: Palestinians Leave Homes in West Bank as Israel Conducts Raids
item.description: Families left their homes as the Israeli military pressed on with its raids in the city of Jenin, in the occupied West Bank.

item.description: The Saudi media reported that Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman had spoken with President Trump, who made the kingdom the first stop on his first overs...

item.title: OpenAI Unveils New Agent Tool ‘Operator’
item.description: The new tool, called Operator, can shop for groceries or book a restaurant reservation. But it still needs help from humans.

item.title: DEI advocates respond to Trump’s latest moves to destroy diversity policies: ‘This is a marathon, not a sprint’
item.description: “Let's not get caught up in the craziness.”
